attributes.action: To call a general election now because of the complete mistrust we have in our current politicians.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I feel that the events over the last few weeks have shown us that most of the current crop of MPs cannot be trusted and so have to go now.
it is no good them blaming the system when they themselves now admit they acted morally wrong. They are only doing this and trying to look sorry because they were caught. Let us not forget how hard they tried to keep this from us. Even looking to exempt themselves from freedom of information acts. The PM (acting without mandate) has not had any courage to dismiss members of his own cabinet who clearly pushed morality to the limit.
the only way to truly restore faith is for a general election now!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
